gameLogic

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLogic.PlayerManager

  • public class PlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates and manages players.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerManager() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createPlayers(int count)
      This method creates a certain number of players and adds them to the players array.
      java.util.List<Player> getAllPlayers() 
      Player getCurrentPlayer() 
      int getTurnNumber() 
      void playerChanged()
      This method is called when the player's resources, goals or turn change.
      void subscribePlayerChanged(PlayerChangedListener listener)
      This method adds a new PlayerChangedListener to the game that will be updated each time the turn changes or the player's resources or goals are updated.
      void subscribeTurnChanged(TurnListener listener)
      This method adds a new TurnListener to the game that will be updated each time the turn changes.
      void turnOver()
      This method is called every time a turn is completed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerManager

        public PlayerManager()

    • Method Detail

      • createPlayers

        public void createPlayers(int count)
        This method creates a certain number of players and adds them to the players array.
        Parameters:
        count - The number of players to create.

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()
        Returns:
        The current player in the game.

      • getAllPlayers

        public java.util.List<Player> getAllPlayers()
        Returns:
        The list of players in the game.

      • turnOver

        public void turnOver()
        This method is called every time a turn is completed. currentTurn is updated, and both turnChanged and playerChanged are called.

      • subscribeTurnChanged

        public void subscribeTurnChanged(TurnListener listener)
        This method adds a new TurnListener to the game that will be updated each time the turn changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - The TurnListener to be added.

      • subscribePlayerChanged

        public void subscribePlayerChanged(PlayerChangedListener listener)
        This method adds a new PlayerChangedListener to the game that will be updated each time the turn changes or the player's resources or goals are updated.

      • playerChanged

        public void playerChanged()
        This method is called when the player's resources, goals or turn change. It notifies all of the PlayerChangedListeners in this PlayerManager instance.

      • getTurnNumber

        public int getTurnNumber()
        Returns:
        The current number of turns that have passed.
